dcterms:creator: Raina Langevin
Mohammad Rafayet Ali
Taylan Sen
Christopher Snyder
Taylor Myers
E Dorsey
Mohammed Ehsan Hoque
dcterms:description: A dataset collected using the PARK tool, which allows participants to record a speech task to analyze characteristics of Parkinson's disease. The dataset includes recordings from 726 unique participants, with a focus on real-world variability.
dcterms:title: PARK (Parkinson’s Analysis with Remote Kinetic-tasks)

dcterms:creator: Christopher G Goetz
Barbara C Tilley
Stephanie R Shaftman
Glenn T Stebbins
Stanley Fahn
Pablo Martinez-Martin
Werner Poewe
Cristina Sampaio
Matthew B Stern
Richard Dodel
dcterms:description: The MDS-UPDRS is a comprehensive scale used to assess the severity of Parkinson's disease symptoms through various tasks, including speech and motor functions.
dcterms:title: MDS-UPDRS (Movement Disorder Society Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale)

dcterms:creator: Jiahong Yuan
Mark Liberman
dcterms:description: The Penn Phonetics Lab Forced Aligner Toolkit (P2FA) is used for aligning audio files with their corresponding transcripts, facilitating the analysis of speech data.
dcterms:title: Penn Phonetics Lab Forced Aligner Toolkit (P2FA)

dcterms:creator: Athanasios Tsanas
Max A Little
Patrick E McSharry
Lorraine O Ramig
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on the telemonitoring of Parkinson's disease progression through non-invasive speech tests, providing insights into the disease's impact on speech.
dcterms:title: Telemonitoring of Parkinson’s Disease

dcterms:creator: Max Little
Patrick McSharry
Eric Hunter
Jennifer Spielman
Lorraine Ramig
dcterms:description: This dataset evaluates the suitability of dysphonia measurements for telemonitoring Parkinson's disease, focusing on vocal impairments.
dcterms:title: Dysphonia Measurements

dcterms:creator: Athanasios Tsanas
Max A Little
Patrick E McSharry
Lorraine O Ramig
dcterms:description: This dataset includes nonlinear speech analysis algorithms that provide clinically useful quantification of average Parkinson's disease symptom severity.
dcterms:title: Nonlinear Speech Analysis Algorithms
